name: Darkpoint
description:
A downloadable game for Windows, macOS, and Linux

Description:

Darkpoint is a game about a defective robot trying to find a new place in the world. Upon returning to his duties, he finds a new prisoner locked in the dungeon. With his newfound free will, he chooses to help the trapped soul and the journey of Darkpoint begins. Find your way through this story rich game and discover the secrets it holds

Install instructions:

Download the zip file, decompress, and launch Darkpoint.exe
